triggers.documentation: Using recovery expression... Temperature has to drop 3 points less than threshold level ({$TEMP_WARN}-3)
triggers.name: Temperature is above warning threshold: >"ALARM_OBJECT"
triggers.description: This trigger uses temperature sensor values as well as temperature sensor status if available

triggers.documentation: Using recovery expression... Temperature has to drop 3 points less than threshold level ({$TEMP_WARN}-3)
triggers.name: Temperature is above critical threshold: >"ALARM_OBJECT"
triggers.description: This trigger uses temperature sensor values as well as temperature sensor status if available
